Deprecated functions

Source: R/deprecated.R
deprecated.Rd

Use tibble() instead of data_frame().

Use rlang::quasiquotation instead of tibble_(), data_frame_(), and lst_().

Use as_tibble() instead of as_data_frame() or as.tibble(), but mind the new signature and semantics.

Use tribble() instead of frame_data().

Usage

data_frame(...)

tibble_(xs)

data_frame_(xs)

lst_(xs)

as_data_frame(x, ...)

as.tibble(x, ...)

frame_data(...)
